record.title: NATIONAL STALKING AWARENESS MONTH

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to Calendar No. 14, S. Res. 24.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed in the RECORD, without further intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
